docTitle.titlePart: Preparation and Crystal Structure of SbCl3 @BULLET I2 @BULLET 1,4-Dithiane

byline.affiliation: Institut für Anorganische Chemie und Analytische Chemie der Universität Mainz,

front.div:
The darkred compound SbCl3 • I2 • S2C4H8 has been prepared and its crystal structure
determined. This new compound crystallizes in the monoclinic system, space group P2_,
with a = 849.2 pm, b = 904.2 pm, c = 923.6 pm and ß = 106.1° at a temperature of 113 K,
and with a = 858.8(2) pm, b = 914.7(3) pm, c = 934.0(4) pm and ß = 106.62(3)° at a tem-
perature of 293 K, respectively. The structure is built up from chains
(SC2H4S---I-I---ClSbCl2)oo with a y-trigonal bipyramid around Sb.
